data.name: ELN example sample
data.description:
A simple example for an "sample" that demonstrates how to combine different data entities.

The sample it-self defines a few properties (involved chemicals, used substrate) and uses inherited default properties (formula, name, lab id, ...)

But the sample also contains sub-sections that prodivde inforamtion about proccessed that were applied to this sample (PVD evaporation, hotplate annealing). 

The sample also show references to other entries (chemicals, instruments).
